attributes.action: SET A LIMIT ON LOTTERY PRISE MONEY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am appauled at the sise of national lottery jackpots to win possibly 100 million is appauling and how long will it be before tragedy occurs on a massive scale caused by a person who has already had a serious criminal history

In the last few years the leaders of many churches have called upon the goverment to make changes to limit the 
sise of payouts.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
